casebody.data:
PHILIP MORRIS USA INC.,
v.
James NAUGLE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Lucinda Naugle, Deceased. No. 17-400 (R46-013/OT 2017). Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 12, 2018.

The petition for writ of certiorari was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46.1 of the Rules of this Court.
